name: Little Musk Squash
description:
⁓Little Musk Squash⁓

-Finnish College Jam #3-

___________________________________________________________________

Little musk squash is trying to escape the evil christmas and get the last remaining halloween candy before they get too christmasy and lose their mind. But its not that easy. In the dark you´re gonna meet some evil christmas ornaments who are trying to make you lose the halloween spirit and join the christmas.
Run through the dark hallways, get the seven buckets and get out before you get too christmas minded.

_________

How to Play

Move by using WASD-keys, run by using shift and collect buckets by moving on top of them. If the christmas spirit-meter goes full you automatickly lose the game.  

_________

Credits

Code/Unity: Eemeli Pärnänen
Graphics: Katri Tempakka

___________________________________________________________________
